snippet: For the first time in its history, Boston’s St. Patrick’s Day parade will allow a group representing gays to participate.
abstract: OutVets, group of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender veterans, will be allowed to march in Boston's St Patrick's Day parade for the first time in history.
lead_paragraph: For the first time in its history, Boston’s St. Patrick’s Day parade will allow a group representing gays to participate.

headline.main: Massachusetts: St. Patrick’s Day Parade to Admit First Gay Group
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Parade to Admit First Gay Group
